SharpApp.Template:
Basic template for beginners (Recommended)> https://github.com/mirinsoft/sharpapp This is a basic template named "basicPrivacyTemplate.ps1" which should be run after every Windows Installation or major updates.

It includes also a second script file named "_undobasicPrivacyTemplate.ps1" for reverting all changes if necessary.

This template applies all recommended policies at once. You can also apply the changes by executing each policy individually. The template is provided by the developer of this app and is maintained regularly.

This template is installed by default. https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mirinsoft/sharpapp/master/scripts/basicPrivacyTemplate.ps1, https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mirinsoft/sharpapp/master/scripts/_undobasicPrivacyTemplate.ps1

Interactive and all-in-one template (Trending)> https://github.com/Sycnex/Windows10Debloater This is a interactive script named "Windows10Debloater" which allows you to remove unnecessary and sponsered Windows 10 apps and protect your privacy by turning off Windows data collection.

It does NOT remove essential system services/software/etc. such as Cortana etc.

Next to this it will protect your privacy and turn off Data collection via AllowTelemetry registry keys. It will disable Cortana, Windows Feedback experience, Web search in start menu, Wi-fi Sense, location tracking and other unnecessery scheduled tasks.

This script gives you choices with prompts as it runs so that you can make the choices of what the script does. The changes can also be reverted. https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sycnex/Windows10Debloater/master/Windows10Debloater.ps1

Template.info:
This template provides scripts which help to debloat Windows 10 and

- Block telemetry
- Disable unnecessary services
- Disable OneDrive
- Disable Windows Defender
- Install basic software components

The collection includes six PowerShell script files which run without user interaction.

They can be useful for deploying MDT Images/sysprepping or any other way you deploy Windows 10.

SharpApp.Template:
Template to disable settings in Windows > Privacy page> https://github.com/mirinsoft/sharpapp Windows 10 provides a wealth of data access to make apps useful and valuable to you. These capabilities, which are security constructs that gate access to personal data, include things like Calendar, Contacts, Call History, and more. Each capability has its own privacy settings page so that you can control it and what apps and services can use that capability.

This template will turn off all options under Windows 10 Settings > Privacy page.

You can also disable each capability individually. Just go to the Navigation > Policies > Apps. https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mirinsoft/sharpapp/master/scripts/settingsPrivacyTemplate.ps1

Template to disable telemetry of third-party apps> https://github.com/mirinsoft/sharpapp This is a basic PowerShell script for disabling telemetry of several third-party apps.

If you are running one of the below listed apps, it is recommended to execute this script.

What does it do:

- Block Google Chrome Software Reporter Tool
- Disable Mozilla Firefox telemetry
- Disable CCleaner Monitoring
- Disable Dropbox Update service
- Disable Google Update service
- Disable Media Player telemetry
- Disable Microsoft Office telemetry https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mirinsoft/sharpapp/master/scripts/appsPrivacyTemplate.ps1

Template to block telemetry via Firewall (Community)> https://github.com/mirinsoft/sharpapp This script will block Microsoft telemetry IP addresses via the Windows firewall.
It uses relatively safe IP adresses provided by the community.

You can see the full scope of this script named "telemetryFirewallTemplate.ps1" in the Navigation > Policies > Templates section after you have downloaded it.
SharpApp allows you blocking Windows 10â€™s telemetry also via the hosts file. Just download the role "block telemetry via Hosts file". https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mirinsoft/sharpapp/master/scripts/telemetryFirewallTemplate.ps1

Template to block telemetry via Host files (Community)> https://github.com/mirinsoft/sharpapp This template will block Microsoft telemetry IP addresses via the Hosts file.
It will download three hosts files for IPv4 and another three for IPv6.

To apply a host file, goto Navigation > Telemetry > Add community rules. It is recommended to use the "spy" hosts. The "extra" hosts file will also block third-party applications and the "update" hosts will stop your system from receiving Windows updates. https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crazy-max/WindowsSpyBlocker/master/data/hosts/extra.txt, https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crazy-max/WindowsSpyBlocker/master/data/hosts/extra_v6.txt, https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crazy-max/WindowsSpyBlocker/master/data/hosts/spy.txt, https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crazy-max/WindowsSpyBlocker/master/data/hosts/spy_v6.txt, https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crazy-max/WindowsSpyBlocker/master/data/hosts/update.txt, https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crazy-max/WindowsSpyBlocker/master/data/hosts/update_v6.txt

Packages for Microsoft Windows Package Manager> https://github.com/microsoft/winget-pkgs/tree/master/manifests This template will add the latest Windows Package Manager signatures to SharpApp.

It downloads the latest manifest files, which allows you to get new apps and software. A list of supported packages can be viewed via the the upper link. To install a package goto Navigation > Packages.

You can use this option to manually update the signature files. https://github.com/mirinsoft/sharpapp/raw/master/scripts/packages.winget
